level.heading: NOTICE OF VIOLATION FOR AN ABATEMENT INFRACTION (ยง 24-1302)

level.text: A Notice of Violation for an abatement infraction shall be served by the Mayor or his or her designated agent in the manner prescribed in ยง 1305 and shall require reinspection by the Department to verify abatement as prescribed in ยง1314.
If abatement is not accomplished by the respondent, District forces shall abate and charge the respondent up to twice the cost of the abatement action.
This section shall not apply to conditions considered by the Director or his or her designated agent to be public emergencies pursuant to ยง 1304.
